query.amazon_review_classification: Classify the given Amazon review into its appropriate rating category.
query.amazon_counterfactual_classification: Classify a given Amazon customer review text as either counterfactual or not counterfactual.
query.massive_intent_classification: Given a user utterance as query, find the user intents.
query.massive_scenario_classification: Given a user utterance as query, find the user scenarios.
query.livedoor_news: Classify Livedoor news articles into topics based on their titles and contents.
query.mewsc16: Classify Wikipedia news articles into topics based on their titles.
query.paws_x_ja: Determine if the given two sentences are paraphrases of each other.
